basics.name: Coen Bracilano
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026 where I look to either persue a masters or enter the workforce as a technician or developer.

work.company: UH Manoa Department of Theatre and Dance
work.summary: Building sets and maintaining theatrical operations
highlights: Usage of lighting and electrical gear
Working with rigging and flying equipment
Movement of scenery and other stage pieces
Run crew as stagehand or board operator

work.position: Head Technician / House Electrician / Scenic Carpenter
work.summary: Working as part of the University of Hawaii at Manoa Kennedy Theatre Team to run all productions done by Ohana Arts at Kenedy Theatre
highlights: Worked with Kennedy Theatre staff as a house electrician, working to maintin the needed electrical systems for lighting, sound, projection, ect.
Worked with scenic designers to engineer set pieces and props
Ensured saftey while using fogger/hazer effects
Running/striking cables for lights, sound, and power
Hang/focus according to a light plot
Organized and added gels / gobos to lights
Experience with ETC console programming / patching
Experience with moving head fixture programming / patching
General theatrical maintenance, upkeep, and cleaning
